phrases.original: Ask the person you're inviting to open the camera app on their cell phone. Have them point their camera at this barcode (without taking a picture). A prompt should appear on their screen. By pressing a button in that prompt, the invite will open in their Web browser. (If this doesn't work, have them scan the barcode with a QR Code app). Lastly, click 'Save Invite' below.
phrases.translated: Ask the person you're inviting to open the camera app on their cell phone. Have them point their camera at this barcode (without taking a picture). A prompt should appear on their screen. By pressing a button in that prompt, the invite will open in their Web browser. (If this doesn't work, have them scan the barcode with a QR Code app). Lastly, click 'Save Invite' below.

phrases.original: Tag invite with my current location
phrases.translated: Tag invite with my current location

phrases.original: This invite has been saved to your account, enabling you to follow up with the recipient later.
phrases.translated: This invite has been saved to your account, enabling you to follow up with the recipient later.

phrases.original: This invite has been saved to your account, enabling you to determine later whether the recipient has clicked on the invite.
phrases.translated: This invite has been saved to your account, enabling you to determine later whether the recipient has clicked on the invite.

phrases.original: Retry, perhaps using another sending method.
phrases.translated: Retry, perhaps using another sending method.

phrases.original: Retry, or perhaps retry using another sending method.
phrases.translated: Retry, or perhaps retry using another sending method.
